verse: त्वत्-कथामृत-पाथोधौ विहरन्तो महा-मुदः । कुर्वन्ति कृतिनः केचित् चतुर्-वर्गं तृणोपमम् ॥

terms.पाथोधौ: in the ocean of material existence
terms.Wise individuals/sages who are engaged i: fold grass-like pursuits (referring to the four Purusharthas - Dharma, Artha, Kama, Moksha) like insignificant activities, while relishing the nectar-like stories or narratives about You (the Supreme Being).
